eecs.jago.element
Interface Propulsion

All Known Implementing Classes:
RobotTracks
public interface Propulsion

An interface for elements that have the ability to move. Provides the translation from a power setting to physical movement.

Method Summary
 double getDistanceMoved(double deltaTime)
          Returns the distance that this propulsion device has moved.
 double getDrag()
          Returns the amount of drag that this system has
 void setInputGear(int teeth)
          Sets the number of teeth on the input gear to this propulsion device.
 void setInputRPM(double setting)
          Set the RPM of the motor that is driving this device.
 

Method Detail

getDistanceMoved

public double getDistanceMoved(double deltaTime)
Returns the distance that this propulsion device has moved.

Parameters:
deltaTime - The amount of time that has passed (in ms)
Returns:
The distance traveled; forward is positive, reverse is negative

getDrag

public double getDrag()
Returns the amount of drag that this system has

Returns:
DOCUMENT ME!

setInputGear

public void setInputGear(int teeth)
Sets the number of teeth on the input gear to this propulsion device.

Parameters:
teeth - The effective number of teeth on the gear.

setInputRPM

public void setInputRPM(double setting)
Set the RPM of the motor that is driving this device.

Parameters:
setting - The power setting
